Hot Toys Debuts Arkham Knight Batman Figure Matthew Mueller Start Slideshow Slide of 
Rocksteady's final game in the Arkham series was the well-received Batman : Arkham Knight , and with a new game came a new costume for Gotham's protector. 
The suit was much sleeker than the costume in Arkham City, and Hot Toys is now putting the spotlight the technological marvel with their new 1/6th scale figure ( via Facebook ). The extensive articulation that you expect from the renowned action figure maker is all here, enabling a litany of poses depending on your preference. 
Adding to that is a variety of accessories that fans have used in the game, including Batarangs, his trademark grapnel gun, a disruptor, REC gun, freeze grenades, and a pop-up communications display, which is probably the coolest addition since it actually shows Barbara Gordon on the screen. 
Batman also comes with two swappable head sculpts, with both an angry and more focused expression. No word on when the intricate figure will ship, but expect it to go up for pre-order soon. You can view more images of the impressive statue in the following slides. You can check out the official description below. 
In the highly acclaimed Batman: Arkham Knight game, Gotham City is under a terrifying threat as Scarecrow returns to unite the super criminals of Gotham and destroy Batman forever! To take down these dangerous villains, Batman is donning an upgraded Batsuit with new gadgets to save the city he is sworn to protect. 
Today, Hot Toys is very excited to officially introduce the incredible 1/6th scale collectible figure of Batman from this highly acclaimed game!
